original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(3501)@</color>對前方斬出兩波翻滾的巨大的血色衝擊波，衝擊波最多可對敵人以<color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(3501)@</color><color=#80cc00>武力</color>與<color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Int(3501)@</color><color=#13ccd7>智力</color>造成兩次傷害。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(3501)@</color> chopped out two waves of huge bloody shock waves rolling in front. The shock waves can hit the enemy at most <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(3501)@</color><color=#80cc00>War</color> and <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Int(3501)@</color><color=#13ccd7>Int</color> deals two damage.
